OrganizationType.name: Local Government
OrganizationType.description: Any local (sub national) government organisation in either donor or recipient country.

OrganizationType.name: Partner Country based NGO
OrganizationType.description: Partner country based NGO- NGOs not based in an aid recipient country and carrying out operations in one or more aid recipient countries.

OrganizationType.name: Private Sector in Aid Recipient Country
Private Sector in Third Country
OrganizationType.description: Is not in either a donor or aid recipient country.
